overview: William Higgins follows 16 of the sexiest young California studs as they unleash their wild sexual appetites in just about everywhere you can imagine! In this 1983 classic, watch as these guys whip out their cocks on the erotic beaches of Hawaii, steamy Jacuzzis in beautiful Los Angeles homes to dark storage rooms! These mne run the gamut from muscular ex-marines to blond blue-eyed surfers and hold nothing back when the camera starts rolling!
title: Strictly for Ladies Only
